== Members ==

This page contains the current list of members of the WestBengalTeam.

=== New Members ===
If you're a WestBengal user of Ubuntu and you want to join the WestBengalTeam, feel free to add yourself to the list of members below. A preliminary guide for those interested in joining or new members can be found on the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/WestBengalTeam/Members/NewMembers|New Members]]</nowiki> page.
